verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician לִבְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> for the sons קֹ֬רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah מַשְׂכִּֽיל׃ <S%H4905><s%> Maschil אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <S%H430><s%> O God בְּאָזְנֵ֬ינוּ <S%H241><s%> with our ears שָׁמַ֗עְנוּ <S%H8085><s%> We have heard אֲבוֹתֵ֥ינוּ <S%H1><s%> our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <S%H5608><s%> have told לָ֑נוּ פֹּ֥עַל <S%H6467><s%> us [what] work פָּעַ֥לְתָּ <S%H6466><s%> thou didst בִֽ֝ימֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H3117><s%> in their days בִּ֣ימֵי <S%H3117><s%> in the times קֶֽדֶם׃ <S%H6924><s%> of old

אַתָּ֤ה ׀ <S%H859><s%> your own יָדְךָ֡ <S%H3027><s%> with thy hand גּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> the heathen ה֭וֹרַשְׁתָּ <S%H3423><s%> [How] thou didst drive out וַתִּטָּעֵ֑ם <S%H5193><s%> and plantedst תָּרַ֥ע <S%H7489><s%> them [how] thou didst afflict לְ֝אֻמִּ֗ים <S%H3816><s%> the people וַֽתְּשַׁלְּחֵֽם׃ <S%H7971><s%> and cast them out

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֪א <S%H3808><s%> not בְחַרְבָּ֡ם <S%H2719><s%> by their own sword יָ֥רְשׁוּ <S%H3423><s%> in possession אָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> not the land וּזְרוֹעָם֮ <S%H2220><s%> neither did their own arm לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> did not הוֹשִׁ֪יעָ֫ה <S%H3467><s%> save לָּ֥מוֹ כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> But יְמִֽינְךָ֣ <S%H3225><s%> them but thy right hand וּ֭זְרוֹעֲךָ <S%H2220><s%> and thine arm וְא֥וֹר <S%H216><s%> and the light פָּנֶ֗יךָ <S%H6440><s%> of thy countenance כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for רְצִיתָֽם׃ <S%H7521><s%> because thou hadst a favour

אַתָּה־ <S%H859><s%> you ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> You מַלְכִּ֣י <S%H4428><s%> Thou art my King אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> O God צַ֝וֵּ֗ה <S%H6680><s%> command יְשׁוּע֥וֹת <S%H3444><s%> deliverances יַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> for Jacob

בְּ֭ךָ צָרֵ֣ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> our enemies נְנַגֵּ֑חַ <S%H5055><s%> Through thee will we push down בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ֗ <S%H8034><s%> through thy name נָב֥וּס <S%H947><s%> will we tread them under קָמֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6965><s%> that rise up

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor בְקַשְׁתִּ֣י <S%H7198><s%> in my bow אֶבְטָ֑ח <S%H982><s%> For I will not trust וְ֝חַרְבִּ֗י <S%H2719><s%> neither shall my sword לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תוֹשִׁיעֵֽנִי׃ <S%H3467><s%> save

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for ה֭וֹשַׁעְתָּנוּ <S%H3467><s%> But thou hast saved מִצָּרֵ֑ינוּ <S%H6862><s%> us from our enemies וּמְשַׂנְאֵ֥ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> that hated הֱבִישֽׁוֹתָ׃ <S%H954><s%> and hast put them to shame

בֵּֽ֭אלֹהִים <S%H430><s%> In God הִלַּלְ֣נוּ <S%H1984><s%> we boast כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day וְשִׁמְךָ֓ ׀ <S%H8034><s%> thy name לְעוֹלָ֖ם <S%H5769><s%> for ever נוֹדֶ֣ה <S%H3034><s%> long and praise סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Selah

אַף־ <S%H637><s%> But זָ֭נַחְתָּ <S%H2186><s%> thou hast cast off וַתַּכְלִימֵ֑נוּ <S%H3637><s%> and put us to shame וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not תֵ֝צֵ֗א <S%H3318><s%> and goest not forth בְּצִבְאוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H6635><s%> with our armies

תְּשִׁיבֵ֣נוּ <S%H7725><s%> Thou makest us to turn אָ֭חוֹר <S%H268><s%> back מִנִּי־ <S%H4480><s%> from צָ֑ר <S%H6862><s%> from the enemy וּ֝מְשַׂנְאֵ֗ינוּ <S%H8130><s%> and they which hate שָׁ֣סוּ <S%H8154><s%> us spoil לָֽמוֹ׃

תִּ֭תְּנֵנוּ <S%H5414><s%> Thou hast given כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> us like sheep מַאֲכָ֑ל <S%H3978><s%> [appointed] for meat וּ֝בַגּוֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> us among the heathen זֵרִיתָֽנוּ׃ <S%H2219><s%> and hast scattered

תִּמְכֹּֽר־ <S%H4376><s%> Thou sellest עַמְּךָ֥ <S%H5971><s%> thy people בְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> for ה֑וֹן <S%H1952><s%> for nought וְלֹ֥א־ <S%H3808><s%> not רִ֝בִּ֗יתָ <S%H7235><s%> and dost not increase בִּמְחִירֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H4242><s%> [thy wealth] by their price

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> Thou makest חֶ֭רְפָּה <S%H2781><s%> us a reproach לִשְׁכֵנֵ֑ינוּ <S%H7934><s%> to our neighbours לַ֥עַג <S%H3933><s%> a scorn וָ֝קֶ֗לֶס <S%H7047><s%> and a derision לִסְבִיבוֹתֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5439><s%> to them that are round about

תְּשִׂימֵ֣נוּ <S%H7760><s%> Thou makest מָ֭שָׁל <S%H4912><s%> us a byword בַּגּוֹיִ֑ם <S%H1471><s%> among the heathen מְנֽוֹד־ <S%H4493><s%> a shaking רֹ֝֗אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> of the head בַּל־ <S%H3816><s%> among the people אֻמִּֽים׃ <S%H3816><s%> the peoples

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַ֭יּוֹם <S%H3117><s%> [is] continually כְּלִמָּתִ֣י <S%H3639><s%> My confusion נֶגְדִּ֑י <S%H5048><s%> is before וּבֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H1322><s%> before me and the shame פָּנַ֣י <S%H6440><s%> of my face כִּסָּֽתְנִי׃ <S%H3680><s%> hath covered

מִ֭קּוֹל <S%H6963><s%> For the voice מְחָרֵ֣ף <S%H2778><s%> of him that reproacheth וּמְגַדֵּ֑ף <S%H1442><s%> and blasphemeth מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> by reason א֝וֹיֵ֗ב <S%H341><s%> of the enemy וּמִתְנַקֵּֽם׃ <S%H5358><s%> and avenger

כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All זֹ֣את <S%H2063><s%> likewise בָּ֭אַתְנוּ <S%H935><s%> All this is come וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> have not שְׁכַחֲנ֑וּךָ <S%H7911><s%> upon us yet have we not forgotten וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not שִׁ֝קַּ֗רְנוּ <S%H8266><s%> thee neither have we dealt falsely בִּבְרִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H1285><s%> in thy covenant

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not נָס֣וֹג <S%H5472><s%> is not turned אָח֣וֹר <S%H268><s%> back לִבֵּ֑נוּ <S%H3820><s%> Our heart וַתֵּ֥ט <S%H5186><s%> declined אֲשֻׁרֵ֗ינוּ <S%H838><s%> neither have our steps מִנִּ֥י <S%H4480><s%> from אָרְחֶֽךָ׃ <S%H734><s%> from thy way

כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> Yet דִ֭כִּיתָנוּ <S%H1794><s%> Though thou hast sore broken בִּמְק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> us in the place תַּנִּ֑ים <S%H8577><s%> of dragons וַתְּכַ֖ס <S%H3680><s%> and covered עָלֵ֣ינוּ <S%H5921><s%> with בְצַלְמָֽוֶת׃ <S%H6757><s%> us with the shadow of death

אִם־ <S%H518><s%> If שָׁ֭כַחְנוּ <S%H7911><s%> If we have forgotten שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> of our God וַנִּפְרֹ֥שׂ <S%H6566><s%> or stretched out כַּ֝פֵּ֗ינוּ <S%H3709><s%> our hands לְאֵ֣ל <S%H410><s%> god זָֽר׃ <S%H2114><s%> to a strange

הֲלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֱ֭לֹהִים <S%H430><s%> Shall not God יַֽחֲקָר־ <S%H2713><s%> search this out זֹ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> He יֹ֝דֵ֗עַ <S%H3045><s%> ? for he knoweth תַּעֲלֻמ֥וֹת <S%H8587><s%> the secrets לֵֽב׃ <S%H3820><s%> of the heart

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for עָ֭לֶיךָ <S%H5921><s%> your sake הֹרַ֣גְנוּ <S%H2026><s%> Yea for thy sake are we killed כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הַיּ֑וֹם <S%H3117><s%> all the day נֶ֝חְשַׁ֗בְנוּ <S%H2803><s%> long we are counted כְּצֹ֣אן <S%H6629><s%> as sheep טִבְחָֽה׃ <S%H2878><s%> for the slaughter

ע֤וּרָה ׀ <S%H5782><s%> Awake לָ֖מָּה <S%H4100><s%> why תִישַׁ֥ן ׀ <S%H3462><s%> why sleepest אֲדֹנָ֑י <S%H136><s%> the Lord הָ֝קִ֗יצָה <S%H6974><s%> arise אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּזְנַ֥ח <S%H2186><s%> cast [us] not off לָנֶֽצַח׃ <S%H5331><s%> for ever

לָֽמָּה־ <S%H4100><s%> Why פָנֶ֥יךָ <S%H6440><s%> thou thy face תַסְתִּ֑יר <S%H5641><s%> Wherefore hidest תִּשְׁכַּ֖ח <S%H7911><s%> [and] forgettest עָנְיֵ֣נוּ <S%H6040><s%> our affliction וְֽלַחֲצֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H3906><s%> affliction

כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for שָׁ֣חָה <S%H7743><s%> is bowed down לֶעָפָ֣ר <S%H6083><s%> to the dust נַפְשֵׁ֑נוּ <S%H5315><s%> For our soul דָּבְקָ֖ה <S%H1692><s%> cleaveth לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> unto the earth בִּטְנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H990><s%> our belly
ק֭וּמָֽה <S%H6965><s%> Arise עֶזְרָ֣תָה <S%H5833><s%> for our help לָּ֑נוּ וּ֝פְדֵ֗נוּ <S%H6299><s%> and redeem לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> the sake חַסְדֶּֽךָ׃ <S%H2617><s%> us for thy mercies'
